txt.en: Event locations can be found around Minas Tirith.\n\nPlace the floral arrangements at event locations.

'So many events, so many flowers, so few moments! These arrangements need to be placed at various event sites around the city. If you could find places for them where our events will be, it would save me so much time!'

Minas Tirith's florist needs help bringing floral arrangements to various event sites in the city.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>

DNT - Directions to the quest location. For example, \qTrees can be chopped down in the woods in the Grumpwood, a forbidding forest in the northern-most reaches of Frostbluff.\q\n\nDNT - Player motivation/event recap. For example, \qYou should use whatever force is necessary to get firewood from only the best trees.\q
